verse.verse_0: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verse.verse_1: The Hour has drawn near, and the moon has split.
verse.verse_2: Yet whenever they see a miracle, they turn away, and say, "Continuous magic."
verse.verse_3: They lied, and followed their opinions, but everything has its time.
verse.verse_4: And there came to them news containing a deterrent.
verse.verse_5: Profound wisdom-but warnings are of no avail.
verse.verse_6: So turn away from them. On the Day when the Caller calls to something terrible.
verse.verse_7: Their eyes humiliated, they will emerge from the graves, as if they were swarming locusts.
verse.verse_8: Scrambling towards the Caller, the disbelievers will say, "This is a difficult Day."
verse.verse_9: Before them the people of Noah disbelieved. They rejected Our servant, and said, "Crazy," and he was rebuked.
verse.verse_10: So he appealed to his Lord, "I am overwhelmed, so help me."
verse.verse_11: So We opened the floodgates of heaven with water pouring down.
verse.verse_12: And We made the earth burst with springs, and the waters met for a purpose already destined.
verse.verse_13: And We carried him on a craft of planks and nails.
verse.verse_14: Sailing before Our eyes; a reward for him who was rejected.
verse.verse_15: And We left it as a sign. Is there anyone who would take heed?
verse.verse_16: So how were My punishment and My warnings?
verse.verse_17: We made the Quran easy to learn. Is there anyone who would learn?
verse.verse_18: Aad denied the truth. So how were My punishment and My warnings?
verse.verse_19: We unleashed upon them a screaming wind, on a day of unrelenting misery.
verse.verse_20: Plucking the people away, as though they were trunks of uprooted palm-trees.
verse.verse_21: So how were My punishment and My warnings?
verse.verse_22: We made the Quran easy to remember. Is there anyone who would remember?
verse.verse_24: They said, "Are we to follow one of us, a human being? We would then go astray, and end up in Hell.
verse.verse_25: Was the message given to him, out of all of us? In fact, he is a wicked liar."
verse.verse_26: They will know tomorrow who the wicked liar is.
verse.verse_27: We are sending the she-camel as a test for them; so watch them and be patient.
verse.verse_28: And inform them that the water is to be shared between them; each share of drink made available.
verse.verse_29: But they called their friend, and he dared, and he slaughtered.
verse.verse_30: So how were My punishment and My warnings?
verse.verse_31: We sent against them a single Scream, and they became like crushed hay.
verse.verse_32: We made the Quran easy to understand. Is there anyone who would understand?
verse.verse_33: The people of Lot rejected the warnings.
verse.verse_34: We unleashed upon them a shower of stones, except for the family of Lot; We rescued them at dawn.
verse.verse_35: A blessing from Us. Thus We reward the thankful.
verse.verse_36: He had warned them of Our onslaught, but they dismissed the warnings.
verse.verse_37: They even lusted for his guest, so We obliterated their eyes. "So taste My punishment and My warnings."
verse.verse_38: Early morning brought upon them enduring punishment.
verse.verse_39: So taste My punishment and My warnings.
verse.verse_40: We made the Quran easy to memorize. Is there anyone who would memorize?
verse.verse_41: The warnings also came to the people of Pharaoh.
verse.verse_42: They rejected Our signs, all of them, so We seized them-the seizure of an Almighty Omnipotent.
verse.verse_43: Are your unbelievers better than all those? Or do you have immunity in the scriptures?
verse.verse_44: Or do they say, "We are united, and we will be victorious"?
verse.verse_45: The multitude will be defeated, and they will turn their backs.
verse.verse_46: The Hour is their appointed time-the Hour is more disastrous, and most bitter.
verse.verse_47: The wicked are in confusion and madness.
verse.verse_48: The Day when they are dragged upon their faces into the Fire: "Taste the touch of Saqar."
verse.verse_49: Everything We created is precisely measured.
verse.verse_50: And Our command is but once, like the twinkling of an eye.
verse.verse_51: We have destroyed your likes. Is there anyone who would ponder?
verse.verse_52: Everything they have done is in the Books.
verse.verse_53: Everything, small or large, is written down.
verse.verse_54: The righteous will be amidst gardens and rivers.
verse.verse_55: In an assembly of virtue, in the presence of an Omnipotent King.
